decision_conditions: The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the local planning authority.
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building or as stated in the approved plans.
The window(s) in the side elevation of the proposed development facing towards No. 77 Roxborough Road shall be of purpose-made obscure glass and shall thereafter be retained in that form.
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Single storey rear extension (Demolition of rear extension, Partial demolition of side extension)
